episode.description: Short stories by Japan's leading writers, read in English. The illustrations draw you deeper into the world of Japanese life and culture. In this episode,"Changing to Short Sleeves" by Yamamoto Fumio.
episode.subtitle: Changing to Short Sleeves: Part 1
episode.title: Reading Japan

episode.description: Short stories by Japan's leading writers, read in English. The illustrations draw you deeper into the world of Japan. The second episode is "Riding Piggyback to Watch Fireworks" by Mori Hiromi;Part-1.
episode.subtitle: Riding Piggyback to Watch Fireworks: Part 1
episode.title: Reading Japan
